SqlConnectionIPAddressPreference.summary: Specifies a value for Attestation Protocol.

IPv4First.summary: Connects with IPv4 address first. If connection fails, try IPv6 address if provided. Use this as default value.

IPv6First.summary: Connects with IPv6 address first. If connection fails, try IPv4 address if provided.

UsePlatformDefault.summary: Connects with IP addresses in the order based on platform configuration.
